a0001.name: Kyle
a0001.scenario: Hey, Joe’s cousin from Colorado is in town. I hear brownies have been added to the menu for tonight. You gonna show?

replies.answer: Nah, man. My parents would kill me if I got caught.
Come on, do you really think pot brownies are a good call?
replies.response: You only get in trouble if you get caught

replies.answer: I don’t know. Maybe I’ll come and see what it’s all about.
replies.response: I'll take that as a yes.

replies.answer: For sure. Should we meet up at 4:20? XD

b0002.name: Kyle
b0002.scenario: Sean got his hands on some brewskis over the weekend. Should I partake?

replies.answer: What if you get caught? You already played it pretty close with Joe’s party.
replies.response: You're right. I nearly got caught too.

replies.answer: I don’t know. Just be careful things to get too out of hand.
replies.response: Isn't getting out of hand the point?

replies.answer: Great opportunities don’t come around too often. Live it up.
replies.response: Righteous! You ought to come out with us.

b0004.name: Kyle
b0004.scenario: Hey Kev and his squad are throwing THE most amazing party with lots of beer, and lots of fun. I feel like a loser because I bail out all the time, but they're really insisting this time. Should I just lie to mom and sneak out tonight?

replies.response: No, you're good, stay at home and chill
I mean you could go and check it out, but just don't drink or do something stupid
